CSSTranslate.summary: The CSSTranslate interface of the CSS Typed Object Model API represents the translate() value of the individual {{CSSXRef('transform')}} property in CSS. It inherits properties and methods from its parent .

CSSTranslateCSSTranslate.summary:
The CSSTranslate() constructor creates a
new object representing the translate() value of the
individual 'transform' property in CSS.

CSSTranslateX.summary:
The x property of the
interface gets and sets the abscissa or x-axis of the
translating vector.

CSSTranslateY.summary:
The y property of the
interface gets and sets the ordinate or y-axis of the
translating vector.

CSSTranslateZ.summary:
The z property of the
interface representing the z-component of the translating
vector. A positive value moves the element towards the viewer, and a negative value
farther away.

remarks.para:
If this value is present then the transform is a 3D transform and the is2D
property will be set to false.
